allow:
Bash(then python -c "
import optuna
study = optuna.load_study(''hpo_quick_test'', ''sqlite:///experiments/hpo_quick_test.db'')
print(f''Study: {study.study_name}'')
print(f''Total trials: {len(study.trials)}'')
print(f''COMPLETE: {len([t for t in study.trials if t.state == optuna.trial.TrialState.COMPLETE])}'')
print(f''PRUNED: {len([t for t in study.trials if t.state == optuna.trial.TrialState.PRUNED])}'')
print(f''FAIL: {len([t for t in study.trials if t.state == optuna.trial.TrialState.FAIL])}'')
if study.best_trial:
    print(f''\nBest trial:'')
    print(f''  Value: {study.best_trial.value}'')
    print(f''  Params: {study.best_trial.params}'')
")
